DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim open , uncontrolled , prospective , non-interventional post-marketing surveillance study obtain data safety efficacy Levitra routine treatment erectile dysfunction . The secondary aim study assess influence treatment Levitra self-esteem ( depressive symptomology ) men ED .
DOC.brief_title: Vardenafil Treatment Of Erectile Dysfunction In Depressive And Non-Depressive Men
DOC.criteria: Age 18 Erectile dysfunction untreated ineffectively treat vardenafil PDE5 inhibitor Treatment nitrate Allergy vardenafil tablets ingredient Treatment CYP3A4 inhibitor ( e.g . indinavir , ritonavir , ketoconazole , itraconazole , erythromycin ) Cardiovascular status exclude sexual activity
